# Data Model: Module 3 - AI-Robot Brain (NVIDIA Isaac™)

## Overview
This document defines the key entities and data structures relevant to the NVIDIA Isaac ecosystem for educational content in Module 3.

## Entity: Synthetic Dataset
**Description**: Collection of simulated sensor data generated by Isaac Sim for training perception models
**Fields**:
- `id`: Unique identifier for the dataset
- `name`: Human-readable name for the dataset
- `created_date`: Timestamp when dataset was generated
- `sensor_types`: List of sensor data included (camera, lidar, IMU, etc.)
- `scene_description`: Description of the simulation environment
- `annotations`: Associated ground truth data (segmentation, bounding boxes, depth)
- `format`: Export format (images, point clouds, etc.)
- `size`: Size of the dataset in bytes
**Relationships**: Generated by Isaac Sim scene, used by Isaac ROS perception pipelines

## Entity: Isaac Sim Scene
**Description**: 3D simulation environment created in Isaac Sim with robot models and sensors
**Fields**:
- `id`: Unique identifier for the scene
- `name`: Name of the scene
- `description`: Description of the scene purpose
- `robot_model`: URDF or USD model of the robot in the scene
- `environment`: USD representation of the environment
- `lighting`: Lighting configuration and settings
- `physics_properties`: Gravity, friction, and other physics parameters
- `sensors`: List of sensors configured in the scene (cameras, lidars, etc.)
- `simulation_config`: Physics and rendering parameters
**Relationships**: Generates Synthetic Dataset, used for Isaac ROS testing

## Entity: Isaac ROS Pipeline
**Description**: GPU-accelerated ROS 2 packages for perception, SLAM, and navigation tasks
**Fields**:
- `id`: Unique identifier for the pipeline
- `name`: Name of the pipeline configuration
- `description`: Description of the pipeline purpose
- `components`: List of Isaac ROS packages in the pipeline
- `input_topics`: ROS 2 topics for sensor data input
- `output_topics`: ROS 2 topics for processed data output
- `gpu_requirements`: GPU specifications required for operation
- `performance_metrics`: Real-time performance characteristics
- `calibration_data`: Sensor calibration parameters
**Relationships**: Processes Synthetic Dataset, creates maps for Nav2

## Entity: Humanoid Nav2 Configuration
**Description**: Navigation2 parameters and plugins specifically adapted for humanoid robot kinematics
**Fields**:
- `id`: Unique identifier for the configuration
- `name`: Name of the configuration
- `description`: Description of the navigation scenario
- `robot_type`: Specifies humanoid robot characteristics
- `kinematic_constraints`: Joint limits and balance requirements
- `footstep_planner`: Configuration for bipedal step planning
- `controller_params`: Navigation controller parameters
- `costmap_config`: Costmap settings for humanoid navigation
- `local_planner`: Local planner algorithm and parameters
- `global_planner`: Global planner algorithm and parameters
**Relationships**: Uses maps from Isaac ROS, operates on humanoid robot model

## Entity: Simulation-to-Real Pipeline
**Description**: Complete pipeline from Isaac Sim to Isaac ROS to Nav2 demonstrating the full perception → mapping → planning workflow
**Fields**:
- `id`: Unique identifier for the pipeline
- `name`: Name of the complete pipeline
- `description`: Overview of the complete workflow
- `isaac_sim_scene`: Reference to the Isaac Sim scene used
- `isaac_ros_config`: Reference to the Isaac ROS pipeline configuration
- `nav2_config`: Reference to the Nav2 configuration
- `transfer_metrics`: Metrics for sim-to-real performance comparison
- `validation_tests`: Tests to verify pipeline functionality
**Relationships**: Combines all other entities in a complete workflow
